scripts.build:logger:443: mkdir -p android/build && bunx frida-compile -o android/build/port_443_logger.js android/loggers/port_443_logger.ts
scripts.logger:443: bun run build:logger:443 && frida -U -f com.habby.archero -l android/build/port_443_logger.js
scripts.logger:443:log: bun run build:logger:443 && frida -U -f com.habby.archero -l android/build/port_443_logger.js 2>&1 | tee logs/sessions/port_443_logger_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).log
